sentences.en: An attractive ruby - red wine with bouquet of fresh cherry and raspberry.
sentences.cn: 此酒具有亮丽的深红宝石颜色,入鼻时有新鲜樱桃的浓郁芳香.

sentences.en: He blew a loud and lengthy raspberry.
sentences.cn: 他发出一声既响又长的呸声.

sentences.en: He blows a raspberry down the telephone line and hangs up.
sentences.cn: 他对着电话呸了一声，然后挂断了。

sentences.en: Melt the gelatine powder with hot water. Stir into raspberry.
sentences.cn: 鱼胶粉与热水调至溶解, 拌入覆盆子液中.

sentences.en: Nose: Ripe, juicy strawberry and raspberry aromas with delicate vanilla spice undertones.
sentences.cn: 气味: 成熟草莓汁和覆盆子的香气混合着细致优雅的香草香料的味道.

sentences.en: Rich flavors of plum and raspberry are balanced by chocolate and espresso.
sentences.cn: 此佳酿充满洋李及覆盆莓果香并与巧克力及咖啡香味达成均衡完美的口感.

sentences.en: She spread the toast thinly with raspberry jam.
sentences.cn: 她在烤面包片上塗了薄薄的一层山莓酱.

sentences.en: Style: Medium - bodied, dry red plum, ripe fruits, raspberry taste.
sentences.cn: 风格: 酒体中性,干红, 成熟果香, 红莓味道.

sentences.en: Style: Medium - bodied, dry red raspberry, violet, well - balanced and lingering finish.
sentences.cn: 风格: 酒体中性,干红, 红莓, 紫罗兰气味, 酒体均衡佳,余韵悠长.

sentences.en: The Gorgon, Miss Springer, the games mistress came back to gave me a raspberry.
sentences.cn: 那个女妖魔, 即体育教师斯普林杰小姐又回来把我教训一通.

sentences.en: The teacher got a raspberry as she turned her back.
sentences.cn: 该教师转过身去时有人用舌与唇发出嘲笑她的声音.

sentences.en: They ate raspberry tarts and ice cream.
sentences.cn: 大家吃着木莓馅饼和冰淇淋.
他们所有人都在吐舌头发出讥笑声。

sentences.en: This raspberry color looks too rich. Can I get only one coat?
sentences.cn: 这小红莓色看起来太浓了, 可以只擦一层 吗 ?

sentences.en: to blow a raspberry at sb

words.tran_cn: 用锉刀锉；发出刺耳声（rasp的ing形式）
[植]覆盆子；舌头放在唇间发出的声音；（表示轻蔑，嘲笑等的）咂舌声

trans.tran_cn: 悬钩子（树），覆盆子，木莓（树），呸声，嘘声，[色彩] 紫红色
trans.tran_en: a soft sweet red berry, or the bush that this berry grows on
